title: Looking for t206 Louisville minor leaguers

posts.post_title: Looking for t206 Louisville minor leaguers
posts.post_content: I am looking for the following t206 players, Frank Delehanty, Ambrose Puttman and Jake Thielman.  They played for Louisville.  Plmk what you have condition is not an issue. Thanks for your help!
